content: that they match up corner to corner thread the long yarn tail into a darning needle and you may need to stitch backward to the corner point then run the needle through one top loop on one side and the corresponding top loop on the other side do not pull the stitches tight and keep them loose continue the stitches in the same way and sew them in the direction of the graphic to the right keep going and end with a stitch in the last upper loops at the opposite corner sew off loose ends please post your projects in ravelry and link to the fika pattern page also i invite you to follow me on instagram @cjbradydesigns and tag me on your project photos with @cjbradydesigns and #cjbradydesigns i love seeing your work pattern & photos are copyright © cj brady designs 2019 | ravelry cj brady | instagram tag projects @cjbradydesigns #cjbradydesigns
